chapter.title: Bugs and Issues
chapter.para: As always, the &PRODUCT; community and development team have done their best to add new features and eliminate existing bugs. Prior to taking any action with installing or upgrading &PRODUCT;, check the links to the known issues listed for this release as bugs may have been reported or reopened after the distribution of the Release Notes document.

section.title: Bugs Fixed in &PRODUCT; &PRODVER;
section.para: The current list of fixed bugs for this version can be found in the OpenNMS Bugzilla System. Bugzilla Query for FIXED status in &PRODUCT; &PRODVER;

section.title: Open Bugs and Issues
section.para: The current list of unresolved issues for the &PRODVER; release can also be found in the OpenNMS Bugzilla System. Confirmed bugs and issues targeted for the next &PRODUCT; release.
